data.eml:eml: Morphological and acoustic characterization of Proceratophrys goyana (Lissamphibia: Anura: Odontophrynidae), with the description of a sympatric and related new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Martins, Lucas Borges, Giaretta, Ariovaldo Antonio (2013): Morphological and acoustic characterization of Proceratophrys goyana (Lissamphibia: Anura: Odontophrynidae), with the description of a sympatric and related new species. Zootaxa 3750 (4): 301-320, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3750.4.1
